name: top_contributors
description: This metric lists the top contributors to a specific repository based on the number of commits they have made.

dimensions.name: author__user__login
dimensions.description: The login of the author who made the commit.

dimensions.name: author__name
dimensions.description: The name of the author who made the commit.

measures.name: commit_count
measures.description: The total number of commits made by the author.

sample_questions: Who are the top contributors to the langchain-ai/langchain repository?
List the contributors with the most commits to a repository.
sql_to_underlying_datasource: SELECT author__user__login, author__name, COUNT(oid) as commit_count FROM commits.commits GROUP BY author__user__login, author__name ORDER BY commit_count DESC
